mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeboard(freeboard_no, freeboard_title, user_id, freeboard_regdate, freeboard_content, freeboard_views, freeboard_image) VALUES(seq_freeboard_freeboard_no.nextval, #{freeBoardTitle}, #{user.userId}, SYSDATE, #{freeBoardContent},0, null #{freeBoardImage})
mapper.select: SELECT freeboard_no, freeboard_title, user_id, TO_CHAR(freeboard_regdate,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') freeboard_regdate, freeboard_content, freeboard_views, freeboard_image FROM freeboard WHERE freeboard_no = #{freeBoardNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM (SELECT freeboard_no, freeboard_title, user_id, TO_CHAR(freeboard_regdate,'YYYY/MM/DD') freeboard_regdate, freeboard_content, freeboard_views, freeboard_image FROM freeboard
WHERE freeboard_title LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
WHERE freeboard_content LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
WHERE user_id LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
ORDER BY freeboard_no DESC) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum}) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT freeboard_no, freeboard_title, user_id, TO_CHAR(freeboard_regdate,'YYYY/MM/DD') freeboard_regdate, freeboard_content, freeboard_views, freeboard_image FROM freeboard
WHERE freeboard_title LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
WHERE freeboard_content LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
WHERE user_id LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
)countTable
